greeting.intro: We warmly invite you to celebrate our wedding with us on 01.06.2024.
greeting.intro2: The civil ceremony will take place at 3:30 PM in the Wedding Hall Stuttgart-Bad Cannstatt, Marktplatz 10,70372 Stuttgart. After a toast in front of the registry office, we will proceed together to Cantine Royale, Mercedesstraße 3, 70372 Stuttgart, where the celebration will continue until 03:00 AM.
greeting.intro3: Please let us know by 30.03.2024 whether you are coming and if you have any allergies.

gifts.text: Gifts? If you wish to give us something, we would appreciate contributions for our honeymoon.
gifts.info: Save yourself the trip to the bank (or: skip the paper): QR codes will be available for you to conveniently and easily transfer the gift.

hotel.intro: For those coming from afar, we have reserved a room contingent at B&B Hotel in Stuttgart Bad Cannstatt (directly across from the wedding venue).
hotel.intro2: Hotel rooms can be requested via the following email:
hotel.intro3: With the keyword “Vintage Locations”, you will receive 10% discount on the room daily rate.

children.title: Information about Children
children.text: Unfortunately, due to its size and potential hazards (busy street, steep stairs, etc.), our venue is not child-friendly. We would appreciate a party for us adults only and, exceptionally, without children. If this is not possible due to a lack of childcare, please let us know. Thank you for your understanding.
